overview: We all love big dicks, and when it’s a slab of low swinging dark meat it’s irresistible! Collectively much much more than 12 inches, watch these pretty white boys and hunky tattooed studs all become slaves to the weighty cocks bearing down on them! Pooled from the top studios Hung Ladz, Alphamales and Rudeboiz, this is a collection celebrating giant dicks and hungry holes, something we’ll all get down on our knees for!
title: 12 Inches, A Slave
